Articles.Content: Hi all, I have gotten the Kosmos Mod but can't seem to get some of the pieces to fit together. For example, The docking port things won't attach when i'm building the ship. Anybody have any instructions or help for me?

Hit W to throw one rotation on the part then it will attach. An odd bug, but known.

Cheers!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
